meanings.definition: To shake or tremble from cold or fear.
meanings.sent1: The small puppy was beshivering in the snow.
meanings.sent2: She was beshivering in the chilly wind.
meanings.sent3: The beshivering squirrel looked adorable as it tried to stay warm.
meanings.sent4: The leaves on the tree were beshivering in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: The beshivering child wrapped herself in a cozy blanket.

meanings.sent1: After the swim, he was beshivering from the cold water.
meanings.sent2: The old man was beshivering after the long walk.
meanings.sent3: The beshivering cat sought warmth by the fireplace.
meanings.sent4: The flower petals were beshivering in the early morning dew.
meanings.sent5: The beshivering bird fluffed up its feathers to keep warm.
